Subject: Galvatron
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

 Galvatron waited for the answer but as he was he looked and walked around 
the confrence room. In his robot mode his height was about 9 ft tall. He 
turned into his beast mode. Again useing the power of proto1000 turning 
liquid for a second and turning into the large dragon. About 11 feet high. He 
stood on his hind legs and crouched. Waiting for an answer to his question.He 
thought of something. "Was that shape shifting bot yours? If so I apolagize I 
needed his power to be able to transform into my diffrent modes. They are 
quite complicated and my systems could not seem to grasp it." His head turned 
to thr right sharply. "Prime...but something is diffrent. He is no a autobot 
or maximal. Oh now this I gotta see. He bowed his head in pardons and left 
screeching out the door with tremendous speed. He was on his way. He had 
picked up a little skill wich allowed him to sence when a  bot was getting 
ready or was attacking in a certain range. It was knew but very useful. He 
steered straight ahead.
